snippet.title: Rusty Lake Paradise [Teaser Trailer]
snippet.description:
Welcome back to Paradise island! Since the mysterious death of your mother your family's island has been cursed by the ten plagues. Find the hidden memories of your mothers past and partake in many ominous family rituals in order to stop the plagues. 

Rusty Lake Paradise is the third premium point-and-click adventure by Rusty Lake, the creators of the Cube Escape series, Rusty Lake Hotel & Rusty Lake: Roots.

Rusty Lake Paradise will be released the 11th of January on iOS, Android, Steam & Itch.io.

More info soon!

Special thanks to:
Victor Butzelaar: http://www.victorbutzelaar.com/ (Soundtrack)
Bob Rafferty: http://www.bobrafferty.co.uk/ (Trailer)
